short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a laugh with a joke of the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every new tab opens with the joke of the day and a random, stunning background image from Unsplash.

Customize your settings to get the most out of every tab!

You can change the joke category to:
    -    Joke Of The Day
    -    Animal
    -    Blonde
    -    Knock Knock

To change the type of background image, find a collection on https://unsplash.com/collections and copy the collection ID. Every new tab will display a random image from that collection!

Click on the image to view the photo on Unsplash, click on the photographer's name to view their portfolio, click on 'Unsplash' to take you to their website (https://unsplash.com).

All jokes credited to jokes.one, all photos from Unsplash.
